location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 33: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, that he has forwarded four dispatches which have recently been received from Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires at the Court of Persia.
